Title: LabView interface for windows HPC
Description:
This project is a prototype library that attempts to integrate in the same enviroment the Data Acquisition and the Data Analysis systems.

The library is a collection of LabVIEW Virtual Instruments that permts the job submission to a Windows HPC cluster.
Jobs results can be easaly collected in order to perform actions via the DAQ control.

Full documentation and examples are included.
HomeWiki:
Lab_VIEW interface for Windows HPC.

The aim of this project is to provide a set of Lab_VIEW VI (Virtual Instruments) that can permit to operate a Windows HPC cluster from a Lab_VIEW project.

For start please look at this short presentation:

https://vimeo.com/41131686

You may also be interested on downloding the reference documentation.
